title: Provide Order Status Update to Customer
description: A customer contacts support to ask for the status of their recent order.

tasks.description: Look up the order using the customer's name or order number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the customer's order.

tasks.description: Check the order's current status in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the order status is 'Shipped'.

tasks.description: Retrieve the tracking number and provide it to the customer, along with a direct link to the carrier's tracking page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the customer all the necessary information to track their package themselves.
